articles.author: Vladimir Hedrih
articles.title: Caffeine use prevents stress-induced impairment of spatial memory - PsyPost
articles.description: A study has found that adding caffeine to the drinking water of rats exposed to social isolation stress can protect them from developing memory impairments.
articles.content: A study conducted in Turkey discovered that adding caffeine to the drinking water of rats exposed to social isolation stress can protect them from developing spatial memory impairments. While rats wh… [+5087 chars]

articles.title: Munchies Mystery Solved: Cannabis Lights Up Brain's Hunger Circuit - SciTechDaily
articles.description: New research reveals that cannabis activates certain brain cells to stimulate appetite, paving the way for potential treatments for appetite-related disorders. While it is well known that cannabis can cause the munchies, researchers have now revealed a mechan…
articles.content: Washington State University researchers have discovered that cannabis stimulates appetite by activating specific hypothalamic cells in mice. This breakthrough, using calcium imaging technology, offer… [+3161 chars]

articles.author: Jessica Mouzo
articles.title: Study identifies potential biomarker to detect long Covid - EL PAÍS USA
articles.description: New research indicates that people with this condition have a dysregulated complement system. The discovery opens the door to drug development and diagnostic tests

articles.title: Distinguishing between driver and passenger mechanisms of aging - Nature.com
articles.description: This Review explores mechanistic theories of aging, discusses challenges in establishing causality of these mechanisms and suggests that genetically informed investigation will help address this gap.
